INT SerialIoAdapter::Accept (  SerialSocket &  clientSock,
SocketAddr &  sock_addr
)  [inherited]
 

Please refer to sock_accept in sio_sock.h

Parameters:
clientSock client socket that will be used for communication after accepting the connection
sock_addr Reference to a SocketAddr object. This will contain remote device parameters on successful connection
Returns:
0 on success and -1 on failure.

BOOLEAN SerialIoSet::Add (  const SerialSocketData *  s  )  [inline, inherited]
 

Adds socket's fd to the read and write fd set.

Returns:
TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise.

INT SerialIoAdapter::Close (   )  [inherited]
 

Closes the socket connection with the device so that it can no longer be used for communication.

Returns:
0 on success and -1 on failure.
